message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,250. It's still a good deal for both of us, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the value of the product. Let's make this work.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,250 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
